author: Special Correspondent
text:
Criticises Gujarat govt. in suicide note

Prakash Shaani, 36, belonging to the Patel community, has committed suicide demanding reservation benefits to his community in Gujarat. He consumed pesticide in Dhoraji town on Thursday. The police recovered a four-page suicide note in which he mentioned that he was taking his life for the cause of quota.

“I am giving my sacrifice to wake up the government, which is still in deep sleep. I want to tell them that if reservation is not given, more Patel youths will end their lives,” he said in the note addressed to his family members and a leader of the Patidar Anamat Andolan Samiti, Lalit Vasoya, a distant relative.
title: Man commits suicide over Patel quota issue
